item.title: Refactoring The SunPy Lightcurve Datatype
item.dc:creator: Alex Hamilton
item.description: I'm pleased to announce that the ESA Summer of Code in Space (SoCiS) program will be supporting me in refactoring the lightcurve class in SunPy.What's SunPyIn short SunPy is an open-source solar package library designed for solar physics.
